thread.title: Clean energy in Georgia comes with some nasty side effects
thread.title_full: Clean energy in Georgia comes with some nasty side effects | www.ajc.com

author: Dan Chapman
title: Clean energy in Georgia comes with some nasty side effects
text:
Solar farms sprout across South Georgia like mushrooms after a storm. Biomass factories down east produce wood pellets to meet Europe’s renewable energy needs.
Natural gas pipelines crisscross the state delivering cleaner energy to homes and factories. Huge turbines off the coast might one day harness the wind’s all-natural power.
